大家好，

函轉台灣研發管理經理人協會112年度研討會暨會員大會-「數位 AI、淨零轉型–機會與挑戰」議程大綱與報名表。有意參加者，煩請自行報名。謝謝。

Dear all,

This email is forwarding the agenda and registration form (or using the registration online) for the "Digital AI and Net Zero Transformation: Opportunities and Challenges" event. If you are interested in participating, kindly register on your own. Thank you very much.
